Such a fun dining experience!   We had a wonderful time dining with 336 during our visit in Barcelona. The staff, food and atmosphere were all great.  I opted for the pre-fix menu-- 27 euro which includes starter, main and dessert along with a glass of wine.  It offers you choices without being overwhelmed with decisions and spending a ton of money.  I had mussels, lamb shoulder and the Catalonian cream to finish--all great choices.  My husband opted for the Caprese salad to start and then the steak.  The staff presented his steak in addition to a hot rock so he could continue cooking the steak to his liking.  After about 10 minutes they swapped the rock and we were good to go again. The portions were perfect, not too much and yet you didn't walk away hungry.  The prices on the food and wine were about average.  Presentation was fun without being out of control and intrusive of the taste--over a great dining experience. 336 is an easy to find location about 5 minutes from the main drag.
